channel.title: Runeslay make Owner Help!
channel.description:
Hi All 562 Help!!
I Just need some help Chris the Runeslay server maker if i login on his account and hi use the admin command screen and i do ::yell Hii There is coming this [Owner]Chris But than with orange crowns if i do it whit my account i do ::yell there stand this [administrator]Ricardox with yellow crowns but i got rights 2 and chris got rights 2 but by his name stands [owner] how i can change that so i got that [owner]Ricardox with orange crowns? please help me thanks.

item.title: Runeslay make Owner Help!
item.dc:creator: @king-of-pvp king-of-pvp
item.description:
@king-of-pvp wrote:

search for the owners name in commands.java or packhandler.java and change to yours bro

Read full topic

item.title: Runeslay make Owner Help!
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

yourserverfile>src>com>rs2hd>packethandler>CommandPacketHandler.java

Search for the owner’s user, and change to yours… and if you have any spaces in your username

example: “hi lol” , be sure to use a underscore to represent space, “hi_lol”.

Read full topic
